How To Play

Qwixx is a dice played between 2 to 4 players. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible by using luck and strategy

Scoring

One VERY IMPORTANT rule about Qwixx is that all scoring must be from LEFT to RIGHT on the score card. More details will be provided.
